Hello, we've launched a new section [anon](http://eos-forum.novusphere.io/#/e/anon) which has an option called `post anon` when you are making a post. When you use this option, it will post from an account called `eosforumanon`. It is still fully on the blockchain! The resources for this account are paid for by the Novusphere team. You are restricted to posting once every 3 minutes when posting anonymously to prevent abuse/spam.

This should work fine on mobile devices since Scatter is not required!

Thank you.

json_metadata.title: Anonymous posting on eos-forum without an EOS account/scatter!

What ideas would you like to see implemented on this forum. 
Some of the stuff being worked are:
-an upvote system
-ignore capability
-moderation lists/opt in moderation
-smart contract based bounties
-user detail page to see post history

Id like to see an organic community push for UI enhancements. People could be posting mockups of designs so that maybe eventually we could have a variety of skins as an option.

[Atmos](https://www.cryptopia.co.nz/Exchange/?market=ATMOS_BTC) the token associated with Novusphere will be used in part with the upvote/downvote system. Currently, our community has been having a vote whether to commit to moving to EOS and the results will be finalized later this weekend. We usually do weekly meet up / discussions on Sunday, where I plan this week to talk about some things like opt-in moderation, block lists and the upvote/downvote system. I encourage you to join our Discord for on going discussions :)

**Anon ID: 8cf624f9eb82c398cb22bc4565b7298848eaca7609868ca8d7b38e0bfd2946ef**

**Anon ID: 8da7ad8dc9a136ff125c823b6b51f2370cd205e075f21689037371222c1a609a**

Is it possible to host this "Reddit" on ipfs instead of http?

The way EOS prevents spam is you get a certain amount of bandwidth/cpu usage allotted to you for the EOS you stake. This is a renewable resource, so if you use up all your bandwidth or cpu, simply waiting a few hours / a day allows it to reset. See for example: https://eosflare.io/account/eosforumanon

All people who have held Atmos since the crowdfund know the endurance required to stay dedicated to a project. For a while it may have looked like things were stagnating with Atmos on the development side. However, if you're reading this and you hold Atmos still, or are about to obtain some, know that you are here in the early days of something way bigger than yourself. As the community grows, development continues, and there is more activity here we will see the boom of one of the the most underrated (and undervalued for all the moonbois) cryptocurrencies to date: Atmos

This is a beautiful use case for blockchain. The cypherpunks would be pleased.

Download zip from: https://github.com/Novusphere/novusphere-eos/tree/gh-pages

Extract folder.

Add folder to IPFS with all files.

**Anon ID: 8da7ad8dc9a136ff125c823b6b51f2370cd205e075f21689037371222c1a609a**

Hmm, but what prevents me from creating multiple accounts, each of them regenerating the resource, and each of them could also spam.

**Anon ID: 8da7ad8dc9a136ff125c823b6b51f2370cd205e075f21689037371222c1a609a**

Cool thanks, I have ipfs only on mobile at the moment and as I know that version doesn't support folders yet. Will try this out sometime.

The forum could work using multiple blockchains, not only EOS. However, an important part is the blockchain must have a zero-fee model and the ability to embed data in transactions for free. If this is not possible, then it will not work. Take for example https://memo.cash , it's a cool idea but since it has a cost to using it you are effectively using a non-renewable resource and losing money for using it. In other words, you are financially punished for using it. That's pretty bad for user experience.

**Anon ID: 8cf624f9eb82c398cb22bc4565b7298848eaca7609868ca8d7b38e0bfd2946ef**

how are we able to make this in EOS but not other blockchains? if we can make it on others, what makes EOS the better alternative?

json_metadata.title: What makes this possible in EOS blockchain and not others?

content:
**Anon ID: 11a42edc7cb465eaeddde68d53f9b7bcea4de4f3f680367faa247708811bfe11**

Your resources are limited based on **staked eos** so having more accounts does nothing lol

**Anon ID: f73546840a000a3c732f113c7c1c3f02c197688523f4df8d126b6500638b7bc4**

Owners of lots of EOS harming the network through excessive spamming are acting against their own interests. The only way you could spam meaningfully would be to have a large amount of staked EOS.
